website_summaries.verdict: A smaller 14.5" American Girl doll made with the same quality and care you'd expect from this company.
pros: Auburn hair is long enough to style
Small size works well for younger kids
cons: Less expensive than a full-size doll, but still pricey

customer_reviews.title: Broke WAY too soon.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am crazy for thinking this but when you buy a $60 doll I expect it will last more than a month and a half. 😡 My daughter plays with her regularly, yes, but also with care. I would definitely NOT recommend this doll to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SUZY

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter's 7th Birthday. She loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's 7th Birthday. She loves it. It is her third doll from the Wellie Wisher's collection. However, Willa is the first one purchased from Amazon and I have the suspicion that our package was opened and returned. Willa did not have a hair net on her pigtails when she arrived, and one seems pulled out and mussed. Her hair is completely uneven. So next time I will pick one out from the store in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Broke very easily
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received Willa as Christmas gift, by February her leg broke off. I am highly disappointing by the quality of this doll. My daughter does not play rough. She loves to sit have tea parties and dress her dolls. There is no reason for her leg to fall off so easily. I bought this doll because she loves the American Doll books. Don't waste your money purchase a Target version doll instead. All of our Target dolls still have their legs years later. The tears over the doll breaking have been so sad. Willa was her favorite and to break for no reason was devastating!
customer_reviews.author: carmen molina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll is just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll that is just the right size for the 8 year old I purchased this doll for. Hair combs easily. Clothes are well made, and easy for a child to change them out. She absolutely loves this doll.
customer_reviews.author: buckeyenana

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll along with $100.00 in clothes for my granddaughter who turned 6 in December. My granddaughter hasn’t played with it until she came to my house while we all quarantine due to the Covid-19 outbreak which started March 15th, 2020. In less then and hour of play changing clothes the leg broke from the socket and can’t be repaired! My granddaughter is very disappointed and saddened as am I!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous doll!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this doll. My daughter is 6 and this doll is perfect for her!
customer_reviews.author: Laurene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful doll!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 5 and a half years old. This was her Christmas gift from us this year! I also bought clothes to go along with her. Savannah loved the doll, immediately chose a name and amidst the Christmas celebrations began playing with her doll "Leah"! She told me it was the best present ever! This doll's size 14 and a half inches is perfect for a 5 - 7 year old. The doll is easy for her to handle, dressing and undressing, and cuddling with her at night. I am so glad I bought her a Wellie Wisher American Girl Doll!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mcewan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the second AG doll we purchased from amazon and we are very unhappy with the product they sent us. First time the dolls leg broke off we thought the little brother was the cause. Cue second doll leg breaking and the little brother was not involved but a little girl who burst into tears over the second doll whose leg broke off. Our daughter is not hard on toys and especially not the coveted doll she has wanted for her birthday . Amazon doesn’t give an option for compensation so take my word for it. Save your money and spend it on shipping from the real AG online store.
customer_reviews.author: BluGroove

customer_reviews.title: Oh No!?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift in 2018. About half a year into 2019 noticed a rattle coming from inside it. It finally started bothering me since everything is still intact and there are no holes where anything could’ve gotten in. I looked online to see what it could be with no answers found, I thought I would read some reviews and Oh No... Now, the leg hasn’t fallen off yet, but something definitely broke off inside and my only guess is that, that is the cause and it eventually will?
customer_reviews.author: Kurbsyde

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this doll is so cheaply made. Sure, it’s pretty. But the way the legs are jointed don’t allow for movement. The doll cannot be put into a seated position. My daughter has several cheaper dolls that have lasted years but within days of having this one, one of the legs have broken off. I expect more for almost $60. Total rip-off as even the hair, clothes, and shoes are not any quality that is especially good or better than something you could find elsewhere for less than half the price. You’re paying for the name with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Candice W

customer_reviews.title: What's up with the back of her hair?
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her but why does it look like a toddler took scissors to the back of her hair? Also, this was given as a Christmas present and exactly one month later, she is falling apart. My daughter does not play with her roughly at all.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. Buy directly from American Girl Store to save the tears. We bought this as a gift for our daughter’s birthday in July. When we took her out of the package she made a rattling noise like there were pieces moving inside. Today my daughter moved a leg and it popped off. Found inside she was broken and that there were in fact pieces moving around inside the doll from when she was first delivered. As you can imagine my daughter is heartbroken about her doll.
customer_reviews.author: heybuddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice doll...but why this price?
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old daughter has been asking for this doll for a while. I finally broke down and got it for her for Christmas and she absolutely loved it. My complaint is this....Why is it so expensive? The doll looks nice and seems to be a nice quality, but I can not for the life of me see how this is any better of a doll than the "generic" one we got her at walmart for under $25. They are pretty much the same size and the clothes are interchangeable. Maybe I am missing something because I am just a clueless dad.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product?
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Wellie Wisher I have purchased for my 2 granddaughters! The first one was fine and so I purchased another and the leg fell out of the socket with a crack around the socket and could not be fixed!! I thought it was a fluke or maybe rough play but her Mom said no. I replace it with another and the same thing happened and the doll I just gave this Christmas is starting to crack at the leg as well!!! Three out of four, what gives I hope Amazon can do something for me and my $240 on Wellie Wishers
customer_reviews.author: Christine Toomey

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Don't do it - I thought I was giving my granddaughter something super special, bought two of them so they could all have fun together. Both dolls had a leg come off sfter less than 6 months of play. I really should have read the reviews but I thought I was buying a well known quality product, of course my granddaughter is disappointed
customer_reviews.author: McKaren

customer_reviews.title: Breaks toooooo easily!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was given one as a gift, and the leg broke off without much play at all. It was close to Christmas, and I had already bought accessories for the doll as presents, so we bought another doll. That doll’s leg recently broke off too (like so many other reviews on here). She wasn’t playing rough at all, just putting the doll in a sitting position like it’s supposed to be made to do.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service for defective doll
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter loves this doll! She’s a beautiful doll - face is so expressive and her eyes are so life like. The only complaint I had was that her leg broke off at the socket around 7 months after purchase. The joint just crumbled. I contacted American Girl customer service and they said I would send Wellie back and they would either repair her or send us a new one. They emailed me a Pre-paid FedEx label and return form. We received a brand new Wellie in the mail a month after mailing her back. Wow! I was so impressed with their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: THIS DOLL IS WONDERFUL. I LOVE WILLA DOLL
customer_reviews.text: THIS DOLL IS WONDERFUL. I LOVE WILLA DOLL. SHE IS EXCELLENT AND PERFECT. IN ADDITION SHE IS VERY CUTE. AMERICAN GIRL DOLL HAS A WONDERFUL COLLECTION. WELLIE WISHERS DOLLS ARE VERY CUTE. THESE DOLLS SUITABLES EVERY AGE OF CHILDREN. IN ADDITION FOR TOY COLLECTIONER. WILLA LIKES A RABBIT. SHE IS PLAY DOLL AND COLLECTION DOLL. THANKS AMAZON FOR VERT FAST INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING AND PERFECT SIZE PACKAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Güzide Erdem Harsa

customer_reviews.title: Leg broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This doll was a Christmas gift for my six-year-old daughter. Her first American Girl Doll. Well tonight she was giving her doll a goodnight hug and kiss and the leg fell out of its socket. It looks like the housing where the leg is seated just crumbled. My daughter is gentle on her dolls. Takes excellent care of her other dolls and barbies, and we have never had this happen. It looks to be a common issue after a few months of use. I am stuck with a garbage toy, and my daughter's broken heart.
customer_reviews.author: sean bolin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Had this doll for less than a year and the leg broke off. After researching this, this happens a lot. American Girl does not stand by their 2 year guarantee when you buy from Amazon. So I’m stuck with this garbage. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: JerzeyMom

customer_reviews.title: Toy for less than 60days
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect doll for our daughter. She is 9 and is very carefull with her toys. Not even 60 days after her birthday the dolls leg falls of. The material used must not be made like the others. We really want to get her fix. She is so sad. I hpe Amazon.com reaches back to us.
customer_reviews.author: Neofrey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful doll. My daughter loves her. What makes it really fun is clothes by "WYHTOYS" that I purchased on amazon as well after doing lots of research, and they fit her so perfectly
customer_reviews.author: $hoponline

customer_reviews.title: The doll sizes are perfect for my six year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are very cute and were a big hit on Christmas morning. The doll sizes are perfect for my six year old daughter, though she was quick to point out that these are not the true American Girl dolls (they are Wellie Wishers), but that did not stop her from spending hours playing with the dolls and changing their outfits every ten minutes for different "events."
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Leg fell off
customer_reviews.text: Doll is really cute but her leg fell off. We've only had for seven months and it's not been played with all that much. With the price of the doll and considering it's a Wellie Wisher, I would have expected better quality. Can see from another review that they had the same problem. Contacting Amazon to see if they will replace.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday and we are very disappointed to see the hair has been cut. For the American Girl brand, I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Phil and Eileen Kendzior

customer_reviews.title: Legs Break Off Easily
customer_reviews.text: We bought the American Girls WellieWishers Ashlyn and Willa dolls (one for each of my girls) in July. My wife tells me today that each of them had a leg break off months ago. I checked the reviews and see that there are plenty of other people who have the same issue. Some of them posted pictures and the pictures posted show the exact same break that happened with our dolls. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it,  doll's leg broke easily
customer_reviews.text: Before buying , I read in the comments that the doll's leg broke easily, I though it was not happen to me, after two months it broke exactly like the photos, it is a pity because the doll is beautiful and very expensive.It is not worth to buying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A pretty classic doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll is stunning. She is a gift and I dont know how she will hold up. But she is a toy and all toys if played with will eventually break. The box had a couple scratches on it but who cares. For a 6 year old, she is perfect. A value for American Girl product that got to my house 24 hours after ordering. Now that is what makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll broke very quickly. Amazon was horrible to work with. Specifically manager Mike in management. He would not replace the doll. Amazon has horrible customer service managers. More than several reviews said they had the same issue but amazon does nothing to correct this error with this defective doll. Please please do not waste your money on Amazon or this product. I am very unhappy with both. I have the other Wellie Wishers none of them broke but this one is defective. You will regret buying this. I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legs break off easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my girls. 2/3 have broken within 4 months. The legs snap off at the hip socket and the plastic breaks. You cannot put the leg back in. Terrible quality for the price. Will never buy again
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality doll
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a $60 doll you expect it will last longer than 2 months! My daughter was playing with the doll and she just move the legs to put the doll in a sitting position and one of the legs broke just like that! I was in the room when this happened and she was playing with care! Just can’t believe I bought this doll less than 2 months ago and it’s broke already. Very disappointed with the quality of this doll.
customer_reviews.author: Vivianny Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Not worth the money- will break!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this doll for my daughter for Christmas. She loves the doll but hasn’t played with it that much and she received it. The other day She pulled it out to play and within 30 minutes of her changes outfits the leg fell off. And not just cane off but the plastic broke in a way that I can’t fix. I can’t believe I spent $60 on a doll and it was broken within 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Pollitt

customer_reviews.title: Broken for christmas
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing christmas for my daughter when she went to open her new wellie wisher and the leg fell off. The small piece of plastic was in the box and the left was propped to look like it was intact. Seems as if it was broken when put in the box and someone intentionally left it. My older daughter has multiple american girl dolls and a wellie wisher. This is not the expectation for a $60 doll. D
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Strader

customer_reviews.title: Daughter approved
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter finished her workbook this summer she was given the option to choose a toy. She wanted this American girl doll and luckily amazon had it. I don’t know much about dolls but my daughter likes it so I’m happy. It is a bit pricey and apparently these are the cheaper versions and there is a pricier line.
customer_reviews.author: Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Broken like many others have reviewed
customer_reviews.text: The dolls leg broke 5-6 months after purchasing. I’ve looked into having it repaired by the AG store, but it costs almost as much as the doll. I’m very disappointed in the quality of this doll and the inability to have it fixed at zero cost when it broke within a year of purchase. My girls were not extra rough with it either.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this doll
customer_reviews.text: I love these dolls and so does my daughter but I was disappointed in the specific doll as the arm broke off a month after playing with it. I ordered three of the Willie Wishers for my daughter’s birthday and the others held up nicely but this one did not, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Black

customer_reviews.title: Will a Wishers
customer_reviews.text: The Willa Wishers are super cute but their limbs fall off out of nowhere and not worth the 60.00 spent I bought 3 and all their legs fell off. Good news is even if you buy it through Amazon or the actual American girl store.. These dolls come with a 2 year warranty and the American Girl company or store near you can replace the full body, you will have to keep your willas clothes but you get a full new body. I replaced all 3 willas for my girl also Make sure to call corporate and let them know about the defected limbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED- DO NOT Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY DISAPPOINTED!! I bought this for my daughter for her 5th Birthday. She did not even get to play with it for a month. She only played gently with this doll, not even daily. This doll is beautiful. This is NOT worth the money! There is no way to even rig this together. I have a very sad little girl! This is definitely my worst purchase from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: SDMomma

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but adorable, beautiful, and durable
customer_reviews.text: American Girl dolls are totally overpriced, but I've got to admit that they are great little dolls. My 5 year-old is very happy with her Wellie Wishers. The hair is easy to untangle and they are pretty easy to dress. The price for these dolls is silly... seriously... but they are good dolls. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! legs broke off of all our 3 wellie wishers!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the first Wellie Wishers through Costco. 3 weeks later they leg broke off. The 2nd one we’ve purchased here.... 6 month in: THE LEG broke off! It’s horribly cheaply made and definitely not worth the price! We’ve purchased a 3rd one through target and guess what: the leg broke. So frustrated! My girls love their dolls and wished for more Wellie Wishers for their birthdays. It breaks my heart that we have to tell them NO!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Lacy

customer_reviews.title: We love Willa.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new Willa after I l broke Willa’s leg. I had pushed her into a chair and it broke. The only problem with these dolls is that they are not easily repaired. The doll hospital cannot just replace a leg like they do for the other dolls. That being said, they hold up well to my 4 year olds antics and she loves them so much. Willa is by far the favorite and she loves reading about their adventures
customer_reviews.author: Emily E.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, simple
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful 14" doll! Great for smaller hands or to add as a sibling for other dolls. Simple construction -- The arms and legs do not bend. The eyes do not close. My 7 year old loves this doll.
customer_reviews.author: DisBigKid

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Doll for a Childhood
customer_reviews.text: What a darling doll! Excellent quality and attention to detail. A bit expensive, however this doll will last a childhood and become an heirloom. Many, many ready made doll clothes and patterns available for Wellie Wisher dolls on Amazon and Etsy. My 5 year old granddaughter adores her Wellie Wisher doll and sleeps with it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made leg joints.
customer_reviews.text: Leg broke off within 2 month of owning. My daughter isn’t excessively rough with her toys either. I feel bad for her too because she spent $60 of her own chore and birthday money on this doll and loved it! She is so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doll for my granddaughters fifth birthday. My daughter told me while my granddaughter was trying to dress the doll her leg broke off. I can understand that happening with a less expensive doll but not with an American Girl product.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzbomb

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my 6 yr old granddaughter in February cause I've ordered several different ones for the same granddaughter and this one the leg broke not sure what to do about this one
customer_reviews.author: Pet resort

customer_reviews.title: Wellie Wishers American Girl collection is worth checking out!
customer_reviews.text: Wellie Wishers is a great collection for a young girl to be introduced into the American Girl world without the heavy price tag. It stands at 14" tall and the details great! Option to purchase books and accessories separately. Would make a great gift! I would recommend this doll. We have American Girl dolls, but my 7 year old wanted this one as an addition to her collection. She fell in love with their story.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Huddy

customer_reviews.title: Problem with doll leg breaking off
customer_reviews.text: We gave this Willa doll to my grandaughter for her birthday July11 and the leg broke on it when she was teying to put the shoe on the doll. Now my grandaughter is a very petite 5 year old and this should not have happened. We found out later that a friend of hers had a Camille doll and the leg on her doll broke. I can only conclude there is some sort of defect with these dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Very upset. Advertised as 18" American girl. The doll certainly isn't 18" and none if the American girl clothes I purchased to go with it fit! What a disappointment for my grandchild!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Shawn Holland

customer_reviews.title: Adorable... perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the sweetest little doll. Smaller than the originals, but just as adorable! Bought this one because my daughter's name is Willa which is just too cool. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the true American girl doll
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot smaller than the true American girl doll! It's still cute and my daughter loves her. However her eyes are brown they're not green like in the picture. And I personally think she is not worth the price. That's just my opinion :) happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: The cor's

customer_reviews.title: Defective Legs
customer_reviews.text: There is a flaw in the manufacturing of Wellie Wishers. This doll was beloved and in the first two months her pelvis cracked and her leg fell off. The same thing happened to our neighbor’s doll. Apparently it’s a thing and America’s Girl will replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Scare Fare

customer_reviews.title: Well loved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll she got for Christmas. The eyes are amazing in colors, like a real eye. The clothing is made well and they are adorable. My only compliant would be that the hair seemed to. E cut short in the back between the pigtails which seemed odd. Doesn’t bother my daughter at all. Howe we I’d expect better hair quality for a more expensive doll like wellie/ American girl.
customer_reviews.author: aerical

customer_reviews.title: They’re expensive, but my girls love them .
customer_reviews.text: Are children have to save half of everything they make as far as money goes so if they raise one dollar they have to keep $.50 in savings. The trick is is that we make them raise the money to buy what they want, and what they want is American girl dolls. You’re way too expensive for me to buy them for them. So if it cost $60 they have to raise $120 to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Aliesha

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, well made doll!
customer_reviews.text: One of my 3yo daughter’s most favorite Christmas gifts! She has a few AG bitty babies, which she also loves, and I wanted to see how she liked Willa before ordering her a custom AG doll. It was a hit...especially Willa’s hair and rain boots, and she’ll definitely be getting a custom for her upcoming 4th birthday!
customer_reviews.author: CMW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this doll from Amazon (If you decide to purchase it at all)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for my 9 y.o. granddaughter and less than 4 months later her leg fell off. Needless to say my granddaughter is heartbroken, as am I, since because it was purchased through Amazon American Girl won’t honor the warranty. If you read the rest of the one-star reviews for this doll the vast majority gave it that rating for the exact same issue so it’s obvious there’s a defect in the construction of this particular doll.
customer_reviews.author: winediva

customer_reviews.title: Years of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doll for a young girl. My granddaughter takes her everywhere. We love all the clothes and accessories that you can buy for her. Expensive but worth it for a quality doll that she can keep for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty doll a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: She's adorable but for the cost the clothing could be nicer and she's a little more expensive than I think would be a good buy. Very annoying steps to unbox her. Would not spend this much again for this doll.
customer_reviews.author: robinbnycAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, the dolls leg broke off without rough play. And her hair was an absolute mess within hours of play. We have many other dolls, none as expensive as the Willa Wellie Wisher, and they are still in good form. We are so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Doll Ever
customer_reviews.text: She is so cute and I love her size! Great quality and adorable clothing! I feel like she’s was a little expensive being as there are many other cute dolls this size 20-40$ less, but I don’t regret purchasing at all. My daughter loves her!
customer_reviews.author: Ktmille21

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty doll with friends, books, clothes to compliment.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable doll just right for children 4-7. Light to carry and fun to dress. Books to tell the story of each girl. Great job American Girl, you have found a perfect doll between the Bitsey Baby and the large American Girl doll.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Lucy

customer_reviews.title: pretty, but cheap plastic. broke after 6 month
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift for my daughter age 4. at the first few month she hasn't played with her to much (since she only has brothers). in the last month she started to be more connected to her doll, but after a month of actual playing (i.e. sleeping next to her, and walking arround with her), one leg broke. she almost never changed clothing or changed her from standing to sitting, so she did not wear out the plastic, it's just not durable, i look now inside and it's cheap plastic. very disappointing for a 60$ doll!
customer_reviews.author: barber

customer_reviews.title: She is so darn cute and looks just like my little girl
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really wanted an American Girl doll for Christmas. She has never really been into dolls and this came out of the blue, so this was a reasonable doll to try out and see of she really wanted one. This specific doll had all of the qualities I would have picked out on a custom American Girl doll. She is so darn cute and looks just like my little girl! She loves the doll! Amazon also has the Wellie Wishers show and the line of books. My girl loves it all! Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hemmestad

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, good price, fun memories.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doll and a couple three dollar outfit packs and my daughter is obsessed. She's pretty rough on toys and Willa has made it so far. She sleeps with her too... 😍 **02/21/2020even her hair is in great condition which, in my opinion, girls are really rough on**
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great doll, terrible hair
customer_reviews.text: We love willa only complain, is her hair! Its always tangled! My daughter has hundres of dolls, and we’ve never had one with such horrible hair to manage! I feel like im constantly brushing it and it will be back to a mess in 5 mins
customer_reviews.author: tmax14

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a present for my niece who lives overseas. She had it for less than a month when the leg broke off. The return window was not applicable as I could not get it back from her in time. VERY disappointing as it is an expensive toy.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Dempster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Cute doll!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this more than 5 stars if possible! This doll is super cute! My daughter was over the moon about receiving this doll! Very pretty doll. I didn’t like the price but these are American Girl dolls so they’re not going to be cheap. It was worth it though! Great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Serious Defect. Leg Breaks Very Easily.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these in June and within a few days it was broken. When you move the legs at all, a piece snaps off. We asked for a replacement and received one in early July. My daughter was incredibly careful with it; it lasted just about two months.
customer_reviews.author: MizuBeans

customer_reviews.title: Loved the doll, crushed box
customer_reviews.text: Doll is adorable and perfect size for my niece, but the box around the doll was ripped and crushed and the plastic piece in front of the doll was pushed in from poor shipping..luckily nothing on the doll was damaged, it just won’t be as pretty/clean when she unwraps the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Box was smashed
customer_reviews.text: Box was destroyed. Obvious damage was done in warehouse because the shipping box was fine.
customer_reviews.author: slsch

customer_reviews.title: Five stars gift,  perfect !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my granddaughter for Christmas. Beautiful doll that is just the right size for the 8 year old I purchased this doll for. My granddaughter was very happy with this gift! Very good price and shipped quickly. I can't believe it, just one day shipping. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Liu G

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this doll!
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old granddaughter loves this doll and all of the accessories. The doll is well-made as are the clothes. American Girl products are not inexpensive but I feel good knowing that my grandchildren have quality, well-constructed and great play-value toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my friend‘s daughter birthday gift! She loves it! And she pretended she is doll’s mam, feeding and holding the doll! So cute and good quality! The clothes are really soft!
customer_reviews.author: selina

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: Very nice doll, brand new as stated. Very good price and shipped quickly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: NC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great doll with one defect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the doll. Good quality, but still an expensive toy! One issue: although this doll has long hair, which comes tied in two pony tails, the hair in the middle back was cut very short. Definitely a bad decision on the part of the makers.
customer_reviews.author: Mom42

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: So cute and great quality.There are a lot of different brands you can mix and match accessories with as well, like the Generation dolls at Target..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: Better for an older child
customer_reviews.text: Glad I didn't get a full size american girl doll. This is a great doll, but at the end of the day, it becomes just another naked doll with matted hair. Even after the this is a special doll speech. Purchased for a 5 yesr old
customer_reviews.author: Meraki1346

customer_reviews.title: An baby for my grandaughter
customer_reviews.text: Great doll. Great book can be bought for the doll. Amazon has a cartoon series about the doll. High quality. I could go on for days. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Derd

customer_reviews.title: They keep breaking!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this doll as a gift for Christmas. Four months later, the leg broke off. She was devastated. So I replaced it. Exactly one month later, the leg broke on the new one! A doll that costs $60 should last longer than a month. What a rip-off!
customer_reviews.author: Jami H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: Love this doll, and so does my granddaughter. Shes well made, beautiful and came as wonderfully packaged. And were having fun making the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter. He lives her doll. This product is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Magyar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful doll. My daughter has wanted her for a long time and managed to save her own money to purchase her. She was not disappointed and it is one of her favorite dolls. She is really beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Just what my daughter wanted
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter loves this doll. We bought it for Christmas and she was super excited. Good quality and made Santa look like a hero.
customer_reviews.author: @afashionchameleon

customer_reviews.title: Willa looks like such a happy little girl.
customer_reviews.text: Willa is so appealing I wanted her for my granddaughter ‘s Christmas . I was going to get a doll that looks like Clara but Willa is such a happy little doll. Does not have the flat features of 18 inch American Girl Dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Nairnite

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Weird hair but overall cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely doll BUT the hair?! I mean it's an American doll. The back of her hair looks like a toddler got into war with that doll and out of spite she cut the doll's hair in the back!
customer_reviews.author: Phappinszka

customer_reviews.title: Pretty doll
customer_reviews.text: Nice doll. I think these in general are overpriced but my daughter really wanted this one. I love the convenience of ordering on Amazon and their pricing is in line with other places.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Willie Wisher Collectible
customer_reviews.text: Nice doll for young collectors. She is a great play doll and the gifted was super excited to receive.
customer_reviews.author: MOH

customer_reviews.title: This American Girl Wellie Wishers doll is adorable! I love the ladybug motif
customer_reviews.text: This American Girl Wellie Wishers doll is adorable! I love the ladybug motif. My granddaughter was very happy with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Pampooh

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my seven year old and she absolutely LOVES it. Definitely worth the price compared to other American Girl dolls. She is definitely small than the regular doll which is PERFECT for little girl hands. I will absolutely be looking for another Wellie Wisher so my daughter and her new doll can have a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Adorable....great niece loved it .... never disappointed .... American girl dolls the best ...
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy. I cannot wait to give this to my daughter for Christmas. She is packaged well and displayed so you can see her. Worth the money if you have a child who likes dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very cute little doll
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 3 year old Grandaughter and she loved it. The only problem was, she had it's cloths off in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They break easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a Christmas present, at 3 months it broke its leg, I enter the comments of the other Willie Wishers and apparently break easily. My daughter loves her but she has a broken leg and handing it to American Girls costs $ 40.00 when the doll costs $ 60.00, I do not find any sense.
customer_reviews.author: lekio777

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Doll
customer_reviews.text: Was as describe and my daughter loves it so Dads happy.

customer_reviews.title: Happiness
customer_reviews.text: Was a present for a non relative whose mom was short on funds for gifts (God's work)

customer_reviews.text: Great doll daughter loves it but it's just like every other doll dont understand the price

customer_reviews.title: Good quality !
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful doll. My sister got this as a present and she loveddddddd her.

customer_reviews.title: Very great product
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful doll really made my daughter happy she really enjoys it

customer_reviews.title: My daughters  favorite doll
customer_reviews.text: We love her ,we can’t get enough of her, she goes everywhere with us ! We even bought boots to match hers & we have the back pack Big fans over here

product_meta.title: American Girl WellieWishers Willa Doll
product_meta.description: Style:StandardWilla has a love for animals. She's sure to be the first one up a tree-and the last to turn away a furry friend. This 14.5" (36.8 cm) doll is sized just right for younger girls. She has Hazel eyes and silky strawberry-blond hair in long pigtails that can be Brushed and styled. Plastic/vinyl. Includes: a Hedgehog tee with a sweet printed face and dimensional ears, a green hedgehog-print skirt trimmed in satin ribbon, a cute headband with fabric bunny ears, light-pink underwear, red wellie boots with sweet ladybug faces.
feature_bullets: Willa has a love for animals
She's sure to be the first one up a tree-and the last to turn away a furry friend
This 14.5" (36.8 cm) doll is sized just right for younger girls. A hedgehog tee with a sweet printed face and dimensional ears
She has Hazel eyes and silky strawberry-blond hair in long pigtails that can be brushed and styled
Collect all of your favorite welliewishers!
